objects.text:
RGB Lighting Effects
Flip Microphone
PC & Console Compatible
Immersive Sound

product_details.name: Wireless Gaming Headset with Flip Microphone
product_details.description: Wireless Gaming Headset for PC, Ps5, Ps4 with Flip Microphone, by ozeino

banner_details:
The banner showcases a modern, tech-inspired visual aimed at promoting a high-performance gaming headset. It features a dynamic dark background with angular color overlays and faint neon gradients, conveying a futuristic and immersive vibe. The top section contains bold, stylized text represented by `heading_1` and `heading_2`, establishing the key product type in a geometric, gaming-style font. Below, the `subheading` text layer emphasizes product features. A concise bullet list under `description` elaborates on technical benefits. Prominent call-to-action elements include pricing in `price` and a red button with white text (`cta_background` and `cta`). The `product_image` occupies the right side, showcasing the headset. 

**Color Palette**:
- Jet Black: `#000000` / `#1E1E1E` / `#151515`
- Crimson Red: `#FF3030` / `#CC0000`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Highlight RGB Gradient (for accent): `#FF0000`, `#FF7F00`, `#FFFF00`, `#00FF00`, `#0000FF`, `#4B0082`, `#9400D3`
product_color: The product image features a gaming headset with a dynamic, high-contrast color palette. Dominantly black (#000000) forms the body, conveying sleekness and modernity. Vibrant red (#FF2D2D) accents the headband and earcups, adding energy and excitement. The earcups’ mesh displays a spectrum LED lighting – blending colors like cyan (#00FFFF), magenta (#FF00FF), yellow (#FFFF00), blue (#0000FF), and green (#00FF00), enhancing visual interest. These RGB lights are seamlessly integrated into the black surface, standing out vividly while blending into each other fluidly. For an advertisement banner, using this combination of deep black with sharp red and a prismatic RGB glow would effectively reinforce the product’s futuristic gaming appeal.
